Articles.Content:
Since Wednesday I have a new (for me unknown) issue with
onVesselWillDestroy

that breaks StageRecovery somehow.

I posted there but no reply yet.

I changed the setup (which mods to use, which not) a couple of times since then.
No avail.

Actually the following mods in my install reference to "onVesselWillDestroy":

GameData\ContractConfigurator\ContractConfigurator.dll
GameData\DistantObject\DistantObject.dll
GameData\PersistentRotation\Plugins\PersistentRotation.dll
GameData\StageRecovery\StageRecovery.dll
GameData\ThunderAerospace\TacLifeSupport\Plugins\TacLifeSupport.dll

Here are the actual logs:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/86mjsthcyaplz47/2017-07-07-1 KSP.log.zip?dl=1

 

Edit:

I will test next session by removing PersistentRotation - it's only claimed that it's compatible to 1.3 but not officially.

Edit:

Removing PersistentRotation did not fix it.

Edited July 7, 2017 by Gordon Dry

The exceptions are all happening in StageRecovery, in the method 

StageRecovery.RecoveryItem.SetRecoveryPercentages ()

You need to start with that mod / modder.

The thing is, I used SR for ages - it always worked, when all the other mods had issues.

Then on Wednesday it started being crumpy.

I reverted what I did prior launch but that didn't help.

I was removing several mods that I added before that issue started but still ...

Dunno, I'm cursed...
